comments.body: Unfortunately there is no license file. Not even on GitHub. Have raised issue ( https://github.com/nvawda/bz2file/issues/5 ).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  # xref: https://github.com/nvawda/bz2file/issues/5  #
  #####################################################
  # license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: "Read and write bzip2-compressed files."
